forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms likely. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms likely. High near 55F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 38F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 34F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 52F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 35F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
